p::selection{background:#ff0}p::-moz-selection{background:#ff0}.share-selection-wrapper{position:absolute;display:inline-block;top:-9999px;left:-9999px;z-index:9999;border:1px solid #f0eded;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 1px 3px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.4);background-color:#fff;opacity:0;transition:opacity .32s ease-in-out}.share-selection-button{float:left;display:flex;align-items:center;cursor:pointer;margin:5px}.share-selection-button:hover img{opacity:.7}.share-selection-button:hover span{color:#777}.share-selection-style-image-and-text .share-selection-button span{float:left;line-height:17px}.share-selection-style-image-and-text .share-selection-button img{float:left;margin-right:5px}.share-selection-button img{display:block;width:24px}.ui-dialog[aria-describedby=ss-dialog-wrapper]{padding:0;overflow:hidden;border:0;border-radius:0}.ui-dialog[aria-describedby=ss-dialog-wrapper] .ui-dialog-titlebar{height:auto;margin:0;padding:10px 16px;border-radius:0;color:#fff;background:#c12026;font-family:montserrat,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:lighter;font-size:1.1em;line-height:1.3}.ui-dialog[aria-describedby=ss-dialog-wrapper] .ui-dialog-titlebar-close{right:12px;width:30px;height:30px;margin-top:-15px;border:0;background:no-repeat rgba(1,0,0,0) url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8;base64,) center center/24px 24px}.ui-dialog[aria-describedby=ss-dialog-wrapper] .ui-dialog-titlebar-close .ui-icon{display:none}.ui-dialog[aria-describedby=ss-dialog-wrapper] .ui-dialog-content{padding:1em;font-size:16px}form#ss-email{display:flex;flex-direction:column}form#ss-email input{margin-bottom:15px;padding:5px 7px;border-style:solid;border-radius:0}form#ss-email input.error{border-width:0;box-shadow:0 0 1px 2px tomato}form#ss-email #share-text{padding:5px 7px;border-style:solid;border-radius:0}form#ss-email #share-submit{display:none}
